title: SOLD: 1880 New York Clipper Woodcut - Henry Chadwick HOF (BGS Authentic)
author: bcbgcbrcb

posts.post_title: SOLD: 1880 New York Clipper Woodcut - Henry Chadwick HOF (BGS Authentic)
posts.post_content:
Good Evening, Collectors:

Up for sale tonight is an extremely rare 1880 New York Clipper Woodcut picturing HOF Pioneer, Henry Chadwick. This beauty has been authenticated and encapsulated by Beckett Grading Services, the industry leader in third party grading. Please review scan of the item for condition details. Sale price on this beauty is $SOLD dlvd. and the first person to e-mail me and state "I'll take it" is the new owner. My e-mail address is: [url]vguerrerobb@yahoo.com[/url]
